--- create_change_stream_for_tables_with_option_null.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2)
OPTIONS(retention_period = null)

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  For: &ast.ChangeStreamForTables{
    For:    40,
    Tables: []*ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
      &ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
        Rparen:    72,
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 44,
          NameEnd: 55,
          Name:    "table_name1",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 56,
            NameEnd: 63,
            Name:    "column1",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 65,
            NameEnd: 72,
            Name:    "column2",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
        Rparen:    103,
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 75,
          NameEnd: 86,
          Name:    "table_name2",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 87,
            NameEnd: 94,
            Name:    "column1",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 96,
            NameEnd: 103,
            Name:    "column2",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.ChangeStreamOptions{
    Options: 105,
    Rparen:  136,
    Records: []*ast.ChangeStreamOptionsRecord{
      &ast.ChangeStreamOptionsRecord{
        Key: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 113,
          NameEnd: 129,
          Name:    "retention_period",
        },
        Value: &ast.NullLiteral{
          Null: 132,
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2) OPTIONS (retention_period=NULL)
